summary: Seasoned banking professional with extensive leadership in branch operations, sales management, lending, and risk compliance. Proven track record of driving sales, developing and mentoring teams, and ensuring adherence to regulatory and company policies.

experience.title: Assistant Banking Center Manager
experience.description: Led a team of five bankers; exceeded sales goals; recruited, trained, and mentored staff; conducted skills assessments, performance management, and coaching. Used consultative sales to align customer goals with solutions. Managed day-to-day branch operations; ensured compliance with laws and Comerica policies; handled reconciliations, NSF/return items, and item corrections. Oversaw customer accounts and research requests; authored operating procedures; trained staff on fraud, operational risk, privacy, and cash control. Sourced and funded business loans and mortgage products; developed lending knowledge among team members.

experience.title: Licensed Financial Specialist
experience.description: Top Sales Producer; Top Small Business Accounts opened (May 2009). Exceeded monthly production goals: $1,000,000 in demand deposits, $100,000 in investment referrals, and $150,000 in credit lines. Opened and maintained demand deposit and time accounts; sold insurance products and fixed annuities. Initiated, structured, and closed mortgage loans and business lines of credit; referred customers for brokerage services and cross-functional opportunities. Collaborated with staff to achieve sales goals and ensure operational excellence.

experience.title: Field Account Executive
experience.description: Solicited brokers to acquire subprime loan packages; established wholesale mortgage market share. Surpassed market share objectives with loan volumes over $6,000,000 per month, exceeding company profit goals.

experience.title: Senior Loan Officer
experience.description: Hired, managed, and trained new loan officers for mortgage production and sales. Funded over $100,000,000 in mortgage loans for single and multi-family properties. Partnered with title companies, real estate agents, contractors, and escrow officers to solicit new clients and generate mortgage loans. Received multiple recognition awards (Top Producer of the Month, Platinum Club, Gold Club, Silver Club) across years.

education.school: University of Michigan, College of Engineering

certifications: Licensed Financial Specialist (Wachovia Bank, N.A., a Wells Fargo Company) — March 2008 to March 2010
Certificate in Project Management — University of California, Irvine (2015)
